00001 // Filename    : OVOLUME.CPP
00002 // Description : volume unit type
00003 
00004 #include <OAUDIO.H>
00005 #include <OCONFIG.H>
00006 #include <OVOLUME.H>
00007 
00008 const DEFAULT_VOL_DROP = 100;                     // distance 100, no sound
00009 const DEFAULT_DIST_LIMIT = 40;
00010 const DEFAULT_PAN_DROP = 100;                     // distance 100, extreme left or extreme right
00011 RelVolume DEF_REL_VOLUME(100,0);
00012 
00013 DsVolume::DsVolume(long dsVol, long dsPan) : ds_vol(dsVol), ds_pan(dsPan) {
00014 }

00016 DsVolume::DsVolume(AbsVolume &absVolume) : ds_vol(absVolume.abs_vol*100-10000), ds_pan(absVolume.ds_pan) {
00017 }

00019 DsVolume::DsVolume(RelVolume &relVolume)
00020     : ds_vol(audio.vol_multiply(relVolume.rel_vol)), ds_pan(relVolume.ds_pan) {
00021 }

00024     : abs_vol(absVol), ds_pan(dsPan) {
00025 }

00027 AbsVolume::AbsVolume(DsVolume &dsVolume)
00028     : abs_vol((dsVolume.ds_vol+10000)/100), ds_pan(dsVolume.ds_pan) {

00031 RelVolume::RelVolume(long relVol, long dsPan)
00032     : rel_vol(relVol), ds_pan(dsPan) {
00033 }
00034 
00035 RelVolume::RelVolume(PosVolume &posVolume) {
00036     long absX = posVolume.x >= 0 ? posVolume.x : -posVolume.x;
00037     long absY = posVolume.y >= 0 ? posVolume.y : -posVolume.y;
00038     long dist = absX >= absY ? absX :absY;
00039     if( dist <= DEFAULT_DIST_LIMIT )
00040         rel_vol = rel_vol = 100 - dist * 100 / DEFAULT_VOL_DROP;
00041     else
00042         rel_vol = 0;
00043 
00044     if( posVolume.x >= DEFAULT_PAN_DROP )
00045         ds_pan = 10000;
00046     else if( posVolume.x <= -DEFAULT_PAN_DROP )
00047         ds_pan = -10000;
00048     else
00049         ds_pan = 10000 / DEFAULT_PAN_DROP * posVolume.x;
00050 }
00051 
00052 RelVolume::RelVolume(PosVolume &posVolume, int drop, int limit) {
00053     long absX = posVolume.x >= 0 ? posVolume.x : -posVolume.x;
00054     long absY = posVolume.y >= 0 ? posVolume.y : -posVolume.y;
00055     long dist = absX >= absY ? absX :absY;
00056     if( dist <= limit )
00057         rel_vol = 100 - dist * 100 / drop;
00058     else
00059         rel_vol = 0;
00060 
00061     if( posVolume.x >= DEFAULT_PAN_DROP )
00062         ds_pan = 10000;
00063     else if( posVolume.x <= -DEFAULT_PAN_DROP )
00064         ds_pan = -10000;
00065     else
00066         ds_pan = 10000 / DEFAULT_PAN_DROP * posVolume.x;
00067 }

00069 PosVolume::PosVolume(long relLocX, long relLocY) : x(relLocX), y(relLocY) {
00070 }
